Tweet Text: A friend’s husband, quarantined at home with Covid, has died of a heart attack. He was an essential worker. His wife tried to revive him, and now she cannot embrace her grieving young children until her quarantine ends. I am so sad for this family, & so angry with Covid deniers.

EXCLUSIVE: Austin Mayor Steve Adler told the public to "stay home if you can...this is not the time to relax" in a Nov. 9 Facebook video. He did not disclose that he was at a timeshare in Cabo San Lucas after flying on a private jet with eight family members and guests. https://t.co/w1uZahGfpM

Diary of a Sad Woman - why I hate COVID.    Sun, Oct 15th - my brother picks up my mom who has just spent 2 weeks in Florida staying with my aunt post uncle’s death.  Mom/dad had both attended my uncle’s funeral 2 weeks earlier.  Mom comes back feeling sick.

Austin Democrat @MayorAdler went on a beach getaway to Mexico after hosting a wedding party even as he told Texans to stay home. “This is not the time to relax,” he recorded in a video at the beach resort in Cabo San Lucas. #covid #coronavirus https://t.co/oB2k0Ufjuv

He traveled there with seven other people via private jet.

Turns out my husband's Covid came from a co-worker, came to work sick and maskless. This asshole could have cost my husband his life. It could still severely fuck up my life if I catch it. My kid is sick, everyone is stressed. We are losing a min of 2 weeks wages. I am so angry!

My grandfather died this AM from #COVID contracted in LTC in QC. I thought I’d feel relief given his declining health. Instead, I feel anger @ the system that failed him. My friend @hvandermeulen put it succinctly: He deserved to be SAFE. This is our national shame @NathanStall
Austin Mayor Steve Adler Flew in a Private Jet To Cabo San Lucas Where He FILMED Himself Telling Citizens To ’Stay Home’ https://t.co/PwmEQB8aI9

Austin Texas Mayor Steve Adler, a Democrat, told city residents in a November 9th video on Facebook to "stay home if you can" because of the coronavirus.

He recorded the video at a timeshare in Cabo after flying there on a private jet with 8 family members and guests.
